content.question: Which of the following statements best describes electoral systems that use proportional representation?

choices.label: Citizens may give proportions of their vote to different parties.
Such systems tend to encourage a proliferation of small parties.
Such systems make it likely that a single party will obtain a majority of seats.
Such systems can produce a large change in seats with only a small change in votes.

content.answer: Such systems tend to encourage a proliferation of small parties.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations
